steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e6h4","text":"THAW the CTAB-preserved sediment sample in the fridge for no more than  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cmmqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10kq7","text":"DECONTAMINATE the exterior of the sample tube with   bleach solution and rinse with reverse osmosis water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"4C28B6E0938A11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"B1518A30D24911ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2473}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehh0a","text":"VORTEX at max speed for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8odf8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1t9r","text":"INCUBATE at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"78870D40938A11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"514D3E20938A11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"54144D60938A11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqpuq","text":"ADD   of Sevag (Chloroform/Isoamyl alcohol 24:1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"70oqt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e3eqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"85EDD680938A11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cn1dp","text":"Steps involving Sevag should be performed inside a fume hood.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uj2e","text":"VORTEX the sediment/CTAB/Sevag mixture briefly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k8e0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hl3o","text":"SHAKE at low speed (Vortexer setting 4) for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"A421C580938A11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j959","text":"CENTRIFUGE at   for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ttt0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o30f","text":"CAREFULLY transfer the supernatant to a new 50 mL tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3220","error":false,"guid":"8AEEEBC0D24A11ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2433}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"9F67B460D24A11ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A38CF410D24A11ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7dit","text":"ADD an equal volume of ice-cold Isopropanol to the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c196a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6irc","text":"ADD 1⁄2 volume of 5M NaCl to the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p000","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckhmp","text":"INCUBATE at   for   (or overnight if more convenient)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"00211A20938B11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"03E463B0938B11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12nrm","text":"CENTRIFUGE at   for   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdr07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13nlv","text":"CAREFULLY pour off the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3220","error":false,"guid":"3721B710D24B11ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2433}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"3E0A3570D24B11ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"41FC7E40D24B11ED970E9BF49E3BF987","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

off EtOH and allow the DNA pellet to air dry completely (a   incubator can be used to evaporate stubborn {"blocks":[{"key":"1l97","text":"RESUSPEND the pellet in   of LoTE buffer. Heat briefly at   and swirl gently to mix and resuspend. Once fully resuspended, briefly centrifuge to collect all liquid in the bottom of 50-mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"95357840938B11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9AF99AE0938B11EDAAED21ECE77F71C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"45","unit":10}}}}
